version_description:
• Publish your posts to Facebook and Twitter to reach a broader audience.
• Share up to 9 images per post.
• Edit your posts after they’ve been added to the stream.
• Now available in French, Spanish, Italian, German and Japanese.

• Force touch support for likes and comments
• Bug fixes and improvements
- Improved posts shared to Twitter and Facebook.
Apple Music’s here! Listen to full songs shared by friends and add them to your Music Library.

• Apple Music’s here! Listen to full songs shared by friends and add them to your Music Library.
• Bug fixes and improvements
Build your following: Broadcast to a larger audience by adding Followers.

- Video Posts: “ Vero now with video. Life is in motion, share more of what you love with video on Vero."
- Social Cards [Invite]: “Send a personalised invitation to other social networks, SMS, or e-mail."
- Introduce a User: “Recommend your favorite profiles to others by introducing them through Vero."
- One to Three Avatars: “Did you know you can switch between one or three avatars? Use one or use three avatars to show a different side of you. (Close Friends, Friends, Acquaintances)"
- New Featured Content Layout: "All new design for finding Vero’s curated content - home to some of the most creative talent, artists, and bands in the world."
- Localisation: New on Vero — International movie trailers, synopsis, and cast within movie post.
- iOS 10 Support

- Bug fixes and improvements
- Video Posts: “ Vero now with video. Life is in motion, share more of what you love with video on Vero."

- iOS 10 Support

Share the love (and who you're talking about).
- Mention other Vero users by typing @ immediately followed by their username and they’ll receive a notification.

The hashtag has landed.
- Make your posts discoverable to other users and find new content and accounts to follow.

Find what you need, when you need it.
- Can’t remember the place your friend recommended? No longer a problem - all recommendations saved in your Collections are now searchable.

• Bio — Tell other Vero users more about yourself by adding a Bio to your profile. 
• Featured Post(s) — Feature your favourite posts on your profile. Go to the more menu on any one of your posts to feature it on your profile.
• New Profile Design — View profiles in Grid or Stream view.

Bug fixes and improvements.
Special thanks to Emre Turkoglu for his kind feedback and assistance with our Turkish translations.

We want Vero to enhance your life, not detract from it. See how much time you’re spending in the app so you can manage your screen time.
Bug fixes and improvements

We’ve updated the app with a setting to hide your posts from the web, iOS 13 Support, and Twitter post sharing. This version also includes several bug fixes and improvements. 
Get the latest version for all the available VERO features.
Vero is now available on iPad and iPod Touch
Vero is now available on iPad and iPod Touch

We’ve given our logo a refresh
Livestreaming: this update contains some enhancements necessary to enable future livestreaming functionality.
 General bug fixes and improvements.

In this release, we’ve added some amazing features. Unique Usernames, Public Profile Web views, and minor fixes to improve the stability of our service.

New: Unique usernames to help people easily find you and tag you

New: Profile Web Views: Using unique usernames you can now share your profile and public posts with the world.

New: Video Share Cards: Share out your Vero profile with an animated card

New: Share your profile URL and Invite your friends from a convenient (•••) More Menu at the top right of your Dashboard

New: View your posts and post directly from within your Dashboard

Fixed: Posting to Facebook and Twitter is back.

Fixed: Notifications list loading

Fixed: Music Post searching for Japanese songs (Japan)

Improvement: Posting videos is now more stable

We’ve updated the app with a setting to hide your posts from the web, iOS 13 Support, and Twitter post sharing. This version also includes several bug fixes and improvements. 
Get the latest version for all the available VERO features.

Thank you for being part of the VERO community and all the great feedback. This is what’s new in this update: change email, phone number & password in-app and overall improvements and bug fixes.

• For those who want to change the email or phone number you registered with, good news, you can now get that done in a few taps in-app.

• Want to change your password? This is now easy to do in-app. Remember to throw in some special characters to keep it super safe.

• Various bug fixes and improvements.

We love it when you get in touch, so don’t hesitate to contact us at support@vero.co

VERO 2.0 is our biggest ever release with an updated design and a whole host of new features

Video & voice calls: Crystal clear audio and video calls with multiple Connections. (Encryption coming in January 2021)

More post types: Introducing App and Game posts, giving you more to share, discover and connect over

Highlighted Works: Verified Artists & Creators now have a link to their body of work straight from their profile

New Improved Chat: Share everything in chat, just like you can in your feed

Bookmarks: Save, collect and catalogue your favorite posts with one tap

VERO 2.0 is our biggest ever release with an updated design and a whole host of new features

Video & voice calls: Crystal clear audio and video calls with multiple Connections. (Encryption coming in January 2021)

More post types: Introducing App and Game posts, giving you more to share, discover and connect over

Highlighted Works: Verified Artists & Creators now have a link to their body of work straight from their profile

New Improved Chat: Share everything in chat, just like you can in your feed

Bookmarks: Save, collect and catalogue your favorite posts with one tap

Improvements
• New UI for Settings
• Added a VERO Chat Widget to quickly get to your most recent messages
• Improved VoiceOver experience
• Added Arabic language (RTL)
• Added Traditional Chinsese language

Say hello to some new features we hope you like (as well as some stability improvements you can’t see but will hopefully feel!).

New features in this release:

- *Suggested hashtags*: get your photos seen far and wide with our new hashtag recommendation feature.
- *Save your images*: lost your phone and your photos with it? iOS users can now save photos and videos you’ve posted to VERO to your camera roll.
- *Celebrating authors*: introducing enhanced profiles for published authors. Explore and download their Highlighted Works direct from their VERO profiles.

We’ve also squashed some bugs and introduced some stability improvements.

Thanks for using VERO and for all the great feedback! Contact us via the app, or at support@vero.co at any time…

NEW! With VERO translations you can choose when you want to see a translation for any post. VERO mobile apps support translation in over 100 languages.

• Browse your favorite authors’ audiobooks right from their VERO profiles 
• Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Love the app? Rate us! It helps people find us and your feedback helps us make VERO even better. Got a question? Drop us a line: support@vero.co
